display_long_description:
Enter a fast-paced FFA arena where five elemental classes collide: ☢️Toxic, 💥Blast, 😈Dark, 💨Wind, and 🪨Earth. Each class brings distinct abilities, movement, and combat styles, creating constant chaos and counterplay.
[media]
⚔️ No teams, no mercy—outplay, outmaneuver, and dominate the arena to prove which element reigns supreme.
[media]
🔥Duel your friends in fun free-for-all matches, stay connected with built-in voice chat, and enjoy weekly updates with new tweaks, improvements, and surprises to keep the arena fresh and evolving.
[media]
